CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 纽带；关系；联系；连接；结合；公债；债券；承诺；契约；捆绑物；带子；绳子；（～s）镣铐；桎梏；监禁；约束；约束力；[化]键；键合；保释金；（Bond）邦德（人名）
结合；粘合；黏合；使连接；使结合；团结在一起；建立感情；建立友谊；为…作保；保释；以…为抵押发行债券；以…作抵押

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有担保的；存入保税仓库的

word_group.brief_definition: 增强(与某人的)信任关系
一诺千金, 言而有信
以大大低于面值的价格发行但无利息的债券
佛兰德斯式砌合，荷兰式砌合

bilingual.target: 友谊是我们之间的纽带。
共同的兴趣是他们的纽带。

bilingual.source: There is a special bond between them.
bilingual.target: 他们之间有一种特殊的纽带。

bilingual.source: This book became the bond between us.
bilingual.target: 这本书成为我们之间的纽带。
他们之间的纽带是牢不可破的。

bilingual.source: He feels a strong bond with his kins.
bilingual.target: 他对他的亲属有一种强烈的纽带感。

bilingual.source: Kinship is the most important bond in a family.
bilingual.target: 亲情是家庭中最重要的纽带。

bilingual.source: He felt a strong bond with his countrymen.
bilingual.target: 他对他的同胞有一种强烈的纽带感。

bilingual.source: The filial bond between them was very strong.
bilingual.target: 他们之间的子女的纽带非常强烈。

list.abstract: Bond是一个英文单词，名词、动词，作名词时意思是“债券；结合；约定；粘合剂”，作及物动词时意思是“使结合；以…作保”，作不及物动词时意思是“结合，团结在一起”。

yingyinNormal.en: As in "James Bond"? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是詹姆斯·邦德的缩写吗？不是。

yingyinNormal.en: I have to go to bond court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我得去保释法庭了。

yingyinNormal.en: I've seen every Bond. So has the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每一部《007》我都看过。全世界的人都一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Her house? The bond we will redeem against your ship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她卖了房子？我们会用房契把你的船买下来。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: Really? She finds the bond court more important than us?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗？她觉得保释法庭的事比这儿更重要？

yingyinNormal.en: Ready. So handsome. Like James Bond. He's better than James Bond, because he's tinier.
yingyinNormal.zh: 准备好了吗？帅爆了，就跟007一样。他比007还给力，因为他更迷你。

yingyinNormal.en: 007? This is James Bond's tux? Yeah. Oh, I have to get married in James Bond's tux. It's a pretty cool tux.
yingyinNormal.zh: 007？这是詹姆斯邦德的燕尾服？我一定要穿詹姆斯邦德的燕尾服结婚，很酷。

yingyinNormal.en: Please excuse me, Mr. Bond. My name is Dr. Madeleine Swann.
yingyinNormal.zh: 久等了，邦德先生，我是玛德琳·斯旺医生。

yingyinNormal.en: It's James Bond. Sorry we're late. That's okay. Come on in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是詹姆斯邦德（007）。抱歉来迟了。没关系，请进。

yingyinNormal.en: Sir, we can't just desert Bond. We have to. We only make him weaker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生，我们不能就这样抛弃邦德啊。只能如此，我们只能帮倒忙。

yingyinNormal.en: This is your basic mortgage bond. All right? The originals were simple.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是你们的基本抵押债券，好吧？一开始很简单。

yingyinNormal.en: $10 million because this hand is meant to represent a single mortgage bond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 1000万美元是因为这一局代表一个房贷债券。

yingyinNormal.en: There are very few people out there who can claim to have out-Bonded James Bond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这世上没几个人可以说自己比詹姆斯·邦德更厉害。

yingyinNormal.en: I ordered my fish on Friday, which is the mortgage bond that Michael Burry shorted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我周五订了鱼，就好比是迈克尔·柏利做空的抵押债券。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold on. You knew? Of course I knew. What do you think? Your father is no James Bond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 慢着，你都知道？我当然知道，你认为呢？你爸又不是詹姆士邦德（007）。

yingyinNormal.en: Evening, sir. Using the Smart Blood, I've tracked Bond to a point here in North Africa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚上好，长官，根据智能血液，我追踪到邦德在北非某地。

yingyinNormal.en: Bond? I ran that check. Looks like you've had dealings with him before. Quantum. Of course. Mr. White!
yingyinNormal.zh: 邦德？我查过了，你曾经和他打过交道，量子危机那次。原来如此，怀特先生！

yingyinNormal.en: Your Honor, this is a stalling tactic. Mrs. Florrick is not stalling. She's been held up at the bond court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官阁下，这是在故意拖延。福瑞克夫人并不是在拖延，她是被保释法庭的事耽搁了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're paying a lot of money to be here, Mr. Bond. Who's asking the questions, you or me? Of course. Carry on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您来这儿是花了很多钱的，邦德先生，究竟谁来提问，你还是我？当然是你，请继续。

yingyinNormal.en: Empress, you have given birth. You know the bond between mother and child! What would you not do to protect them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 皇后，您也有孩子，您知道母亲和孩子之间血浓于水，您为了保护他们又会做出什么来呢？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 砌合；黏合；（使）黏合；将砌成搭接式的；存入关栈；（bond的现在分词）

word_family.mean: n. 结合；债券；镣铐；枷锁；契约；合同；键；砌合；南非白人同盟；（Bond）人名：邦德

sense_info_list.en: establish a relationship with someone based on shared feelings, interests, or experiences

examination_example.sentence: The rats may have <highlight>bonded</highlight> more with the social robot because it displayed behaviors like communal exploring and playing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老鼠可能与社交机器人有更多的联系，因为它表现出共同探索和一起玩耍的行为。

examination_example.sentence: Some experts attribute the stress-reducing, health-related benefits of hugging to the release of oxytocin, often called "the <highlight>bonding</highlight> hormone".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些专家将拥抱带来的减压和健康益处归因于催产素的释放，催产素通常被称为“粘合激素”。

sense_info_list.en: an official paper given by the government or a company to show that you have lent them money that they will pay back to you at a particular interest rate
a legal written agreement or promise
join or be joined securely to something else, especially by means of an adhesive substance, heat, or pressure

word_usage.usage:
bond作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。
作及物动词时，其后可接名词或代词，如：This new glue bonds a variety of surfaces in seconds. 这种新胶水能在几秒钟内粘合各种表面。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 增强(与某人的)信任关系

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: establish a relationship with someone based on shared feelings, interests, or experiences

examination_example.sentence: Your novel is about soldiers and it focuses on their relationships, especially the <highlight>bond</highlight> between sons and mothers and men and their wives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的小说是关于士兵的，关注他们的关系，尤其是儿子和母亲、男人和妻子之间的关系。

examination_example.sentence: On many occasions in daily life, people benefit more from their social <highlight>bonds</highlight> than from knowing the truth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在日常生活中的许多场合，人们从他们的社会关系中获益比从了解真相中获益更多。

examination_example.sentence: Others talked about enjoying their own company, of growth through adversity, deepening <highlight>bonds</highlight> of friendships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他人则谈到了她们会享受独处，在逆境中成长，加深友谊的纽带。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: establish a relationship with someone based on shared feelings; interests; or experiences

examination_example.sentence: The researchers explained that "many owners regard their pets as a family member, and form close social <highlight>bonds</highlight> with them."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员解释说，“许多主人把他们的宠物视为家庭成员，与它们建立了密切的社会关系。”

examination_example.sentence: But surely, that's a positive sign showing that Mr. <highlight>Bond</highlight> has a lot of trust in you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但毫无疑问，这是一个积极的信号，表明邦德先生非常信任你。

examination_example.sentence: Have you approached Mr. <highlight>Bond</highlight> about this particular problem?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你有没有就这个特殊的问题联系过邦德先生？

examination_example.sentence: Well, I'd like to talk to you about Tim <highlight>Bond</highlight>, the department manager.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 嗯，我想和你谈谈部门经理蒂姆·邦德。

sense_info_list.en: an official paper given by the government or a company to show that you have lent them money that they will pay back to you at a particular interest rate

make an agreement with legal force; 
a legal written agreement or promise
join or be joined securely to something else; especially by means of an adhesive substance; heat; or pressure

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: establish a relationship with someone based on shared feelings, interests, or experiences

examination_example.sentence: Social <highlight>bonds</highlight> are created among individuals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们之间产生了社会纽带。

examination_example.sentence: Dunn believes that people who reach out to strangers feel a significantly greater sense of belonging, a <highlight>bond</highlight> with others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Dunn认为，向陌生人伸出援手的人会感到一种强烈的归属感，那是一种与他人建立联系的纽带。

examination_example.sentence: If you'd like to build a powerful <highlight>bond</highlight> with your garden, start by taking some time to recall the gardens of your youth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想与你的花园建立牢固的纽带，那就从花点时间回忆你年轻时看到的花园开始吧。

examination_example.sentence: "Just five more minutes outdoors can make a difference," David <highlight>Bond</highlight> says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “只要在户外多呆五分钟，就会有所不同，”大卫·邦德说。

examination_example.sentence: David <highlight>Bond</highlight>: A Role Model for Children
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大卫·邦德：孩子们的榜样

examination_example.sentence: How did David <highlight>Bond</highlight> advocate his idea?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大卫·邦德是如何倡导他的理念的？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Mr. <highlight>Bond</highlight>' s story is that Janet was a little late back to school in the afternoon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 邦德先生的说法是，珍妮特下午回学校晚了一点。

examination_example.sentence: Janet <highlight>Bond</highlight> was a quiet little mouse of a child.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍妮特·邦德是个安静的小老鼠。

examination_example.sentence: “I have had a most serious accusation(投诉) made against you by Mrs. <highlight>Bond</highlight>.”
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我收到了邦德太太对你提出的最严重指控。”

sense_info_list.en: establish a relationship with someone based on shared feelings, interests, or experiences

examination_example.sentence: Understanding the importance of people-to-people exchanges in establishing <highlight>bonds</highlight>, human <highlight>bonds</highlight> between peoples.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 理解人与人之间的交流在建立人民之间的纽带方面的重要性。

examination_example.sentence: What does the underlined phrase “establishing <highlight>bonds</highlight>” in Paragraph 5 mean?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第5段中带下划线的“建立联系”是什么意思？
